meanings.definition: Short for carbohydrates, a type of nutrient that provides energy to the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating carbos like bread and pasta gives you energy.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often consume carbos before a big race.
meanings.sent3: I told my friend to eat more carbos so he can keep up with me on our hike.
meanings.sent4: Carbos are like fuel for your body, keeping you going throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: Remember to include enough carbos in your diet for a healthy lifestyle.

meanings.definition: Plural of carbo, a colloquial term for a carbohydrate-rich food.
meanings.sent1: The buffet had a variety of delicious carbos to choose from.
meanings.sent2: She packed her lunch with tasty carbos for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent3: I can't resist carbos like potatoes and rice, they're so satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The restaurant specializes in serving carbos in creative ways.
meanings.sent5: Carbos are the best part of a hearty meal, making it so enjoyable.

meanings.definition: Informal term for carbohydrates, often used in the context of diet and nutrition.
meanings.sent1: Watching your intake of carbos is important for a balanced diet.
meanings.sent2: She decided to cut down on carbos to improve her health.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe how many carbos are in my favorite snacks!
meanings.sent4: Carbos play a crucial role in providing energy for your body.
meanings.sent5: Learning about carbos can help you make better food choices.
